trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Merlan can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: Merlan can attempt to {@action hide} when he is obscured by a Medium or bigger creature.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Merlan has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Merlan rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} Despite giving my all at my trade, I always fall short of my ancestors. (Suffering)
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I am brave and corageous, even against the cruelest enemies. (Virtue)
